abstract: Microsoft’s older program for displaying images has been replaced with the new Photos app, but you have alternatives.
snippet: Microsoft’s older program for displaying images has been replaced with the new Photos app, but you have alternatives.
lead_paragraph: Q. Can you recommend a better image viewer than the one that comes with Windows 10? The old Windows Photo Viewer was fine — maybe it is possible to get that back?

headline.main: Restoring Windows Photo Viewer in Windows 10
